message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper focuses on natural language generation, specifically on generating long and informative reviews. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also utilizes deep learning techniques, which suggests it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves modeling aspect transitions and utilizing context information, which could place it in cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper's focus on generating text suggests it could also belong to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
